snippet.title: SlenderSpace Pre-Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD PLAYABLE VERSION (not yet in beta).
http://slenderspace.webs.com/

!!!WAR IN MINECRAFT IS STILL BEING MADE!!! Its not easy making something like WIMC on your own.

This here is a game I'm working on when I need a break from working on war in minecraft (Trust me working on the same thing every day for months can get to you).
I plan to make this game a 2 player co-op (in co-op you get access to other parts of the map that's locked off from single player).
I always wondered. What would slender look like if he was a Necromorph, and ran at the player if you look at him for to long. Well thats what this game is.

For more information don't forget to like my facebook page
http://www.facebook.com/pages/RickkMurray/225657760801161
